mapper.select: select order_watch_serial_number AS "watchSerialNumber", SUM(order_watch_number) AS "total", DATE_FORMAT(order_detail_time,'%Y-%m-%d') AS "orderTime" FROM watch_order_detail WHERE order_detail_time BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime} GROUP BY DAY(order_detail_time),watch_id;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO watch_order_detail( id, order_id, watch_id, order_watch_serial_number, order_watch_title, order_detail_old_price, order_watch_number, order_detail_picture, order_detail_state, order_detail_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{watchId}, #{orderWatchSerialNumber}, #{orderWatchTitle}, #{orderDetailOldPrice}, #{orderWatchNumber}, #{orderDetailPicture}, #{orderDetailState}, #{orderDetailTime} )
